readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.39/f Elliott 500/p Elliott: 50s/2 5/farmer 3 9 0 Elliott 1 5 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 2/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "@！请进。"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 500/speak Elliott "欢迎光临寒……舍。"/faceDirection Elliott 0/speak Elliott "这是我的书桌。我大部分时间都花在这上面。"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "从我懂事起，我就想当作家了。我跟你说过没？#$b#所以我才自己住在这里。我发现独自住在海边有助于文学灵感的诞生……$s"/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "家里人都说我疯了……说我永远都不可能当上作家。#$b#你相信吗？他们说“每个成功作家的背后都有 1000 个悲惨的失败者”。多悲观呐……真让人难受。"/pause 700/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "我从你眼睛里就能看出来……你相信我，@。你眼中有热情。#$b#真是太好了！这就是我想要的……"/pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "$q 958699 null#问个问题……你喜欢什么样的书，@？#$r 958699 30 event_idea1#悬念#$r 958700 30 event_idea2#浪漫#$r 958701 30 event_idea3#科幻"/pause 500/speak Elliott "好！说我说得够多了！"/pause 400/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "唔……你应该很了解植物吧？"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "你能不能看看这盆玫瑰？它好像有点蔫。$7"/pause 400/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/pause 400/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 200/end dialogue Elliott "谢谢你陪我聊天……我会想想你说的话的。"
content.423502/f Elliott 1500/p Elliott: elliottPiano/-200 -1000/farmer 3 9 0 Elliott 8 4 0/skippable/positionOffset Elliott 32 16/animate Elliott false true 400 25 26 26 27 27 26 26 25 26 27 27 26 26 25/pause 1000/viewport 8 4 true/pause 24000/stopAnimation Elliott/showFrame Elliott 24/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer 4 0 0/showFrame Elliott 28/pause 1000/speak Elliott "啊……我就感觉到有人在那儿。$7"/pause 1000/showFrame Elliott 30/animate Elliott false false 200 28 29 30/playSound dwop/pause 1000/question fork1 "#真的很棒。#你弹了多久？"/fork howLong/pause 500/emote Elliott 32/speak Elliott "谢谢。我琴技不算太好，但我很开心。$h"/switchEvent elliottPianoJoin
content.howLong: pause 500/resetVariable/speak Elliott "噢，我也不确定……我从小就弹钢琴了。$7#$b#我不算太好，但我很开心。"/switchEvent elliottPianoJoin
content.elliottPianoJoin: pause 800/showFrame Elliott 0/animate Elliott false true 220 0 1 2 3/playSound woodyStep/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/stopAnimation Elliott/faceDirection Elliott 2/pause 500/move Elliott 1 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1500/showFrame Elliott 31/pause 800/emote Elliott 28/pause 800/speak Elliott "我夜以继日想要完成我的书……我都快疯了，@。$s"/showFrame Elliott 4/pause 800/move Elliott -2 0 0/pause 800/speak Elliott "我唯一的消遣就只有随性弹首曲子。$7"/pause 600/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "工作实在太多了！而且我的存款也渐渐见底了。$7#$b#有时候我真想抛弃一切，像你一样当个农夫。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/question fork1 "#当农夫也一样艰难。#过来农场生活吧，我需要帮忙。"/fork extraHelp/pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "你说得对……事不关己所以才会说这种话。$8"/move Elliott 0 1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "我的意思是想要逃离这阴暗潮湿的监牢，去享受一点真正的生活……仅此而已。$s"/animate Elliott true true 100 31/pause 800/emote Elliott 28/pause 500/speak Elliott "*唉*……抱歉让你听我唠叨了，我时不时就得跟别人吐吐苦水。$7"/pause 500/stopAnimation Elliott/showFrame Elliott 4/pause 600/faceDirection Elliott 3/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.extraHelp: pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "真的吗？$8"/faceDirection Elliott 1/pause 400/speak Elliott "可我的小说不能弃坑啊。都快写完一半了。$7"/animate Elliott true true 100 31/pause 800/emote Elliott 28/pause 500/speak Elliott "*唉*……抱歉让你听我唠叨了。我时不时就得跟别人吐吐苦水。$7"/pause 500/stopAnimation Elliott/showFrame Elliott 4/pause 600/faceDirection Elliott 3/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
